endingOwner","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"token","type":"address"}],"name":"previewPending","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"renounceOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"rewardIndex","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_gauge","type":"address"}],"name":"setGauge","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"newMintRate","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setMintRate","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"token","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"stake","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"token","type":"address"}],"name":"tokenRewardInfos","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"stakedAmount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"lastRewardIndex_","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalStakedAmount","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"token","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"unstake","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"user","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"token","type":"address"}],"name":"userStakes","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"This contract implements a sophisticated staking system with time-based reward accrual:      Core Mechanics:      - Users stake SuperDCA tokens into specific token \"buckets\" (non-DCA tokens)      - Global reward index grows continuously based on time and mint rate      - Individual rewards calculated as: staked_amount * (current_index - user_last_index)      - Only listed tokens (verified via gauge) can receive stakes      Integration Architecture:      - Isolated from Uniswap V4 hook for clean separation of concerns      - Gauge contract calls accrueReward() during hook events      - This contract handles accounting; gauge handles minting and distribution      - Owner/gauge can update mint rate for dynamic reward adjustment      Security Features:      - Token listing verification prevents staking in unlisted tokens      - Per-user token set tracking for efficient queries      - Authorized gauge pattern prevents unauthorized reward accrual      - Mathematical precision with 1e18 scaling for reward calculations","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. "MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://df6f0c459663c9858b6cba2cda1d14a7d05a985bed6d2de72bd8e78c25ee79db","dweb:/ipfs/QmeTTxZ7qVk9rjEv2R4CpCwdf8UMCcRqDNMvzNxHc3Fnn9"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Panic.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf7fe324703a64fc51702311dc51562d5cb1497734f074e4f483bfb6717572d7a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c6a5ff4f9fd8649b7ee20800b7fa387d3465bd77cf20c2d1068cd5c98e1ed57a","dweb:/ipfs/QmVSaVJf9FXFhdYEYeCEfjMVHrxDh5qL4CGkxdMWpQCrqG"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa00be322d7db5786750ce0ac7e2f5b633ac30a5ed5fa1ced1e74acfc19acecea","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6c84e822f87cbdc4082533b626667b6928715bb2b1e8e7eb96954cebb9e38c8d","dweb:/ipfs/QmZmy9dgxLTerBAQDuuHqbL6EpgRxddqgv5KmwpXYVbKz1"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/SafeCast.sol":{"keccak256":"0x195533c86d0ef72bcc06456a4f66a9b941f38eb403739b00f21fd7c1abd1ae54","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b1d578337048cad08c1c03041cca5978eff5428aa130c781b271ad9e5566e1f8","dweb:/ipfs/QmPFKL2r9CBsMwmUqqdcFPfHZB2qcs9g1HDrPxzWSxomvy"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/structs/EnumerableSet.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9b161e97b8967d4bc0c08d25741889a30692cdda4b71910bf1b0e315f1962212","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://821500c39d095eaa25b06f46e65f1d0e97c4c96b39227f79077dee7d9e84051f","dweb:/ipfs/QmSTeGorKzSWF6HAmxo32uCZiEuKNvreQdUiX1AaYtUMTz"]},"src/SuperDCAStaking.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7c1f6c16a46c40a34d524b809bf3ce9cb8fd1ccfb423cb9269641450eecd264f","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://033fb0c113c411e950d4aefe863d8c3eee70a23c33f4ba798c20e3db5aa85ddc","dweb:/ipfs/Qmf179a3gxayYDv9uDeZ4c8ioJZ1CYzY4cKDpUZi2xNXN1"]},"src/interfaces/ISuperDCAGauge.sol":{"keccak256":"0x09ad89a30eda870fc2dd11e01c57c87d346335496919789b9cc0345e7edcc4eb","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://f12731abdbd913ffc2f5a3dc14aff15740f54228f910785fcb45e46a193d9b9c","dweb:/ipfs/QmXcWZDEY9jAmUEmUXPLXWNKRHLLLjsKQXLj8YsAFjSHjT"]},"src/interfaces/ISuperDCAStaking.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf2dc6fcab246e5842f1af978d170020d7173a0c68c0bc52f288834e28795484c","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://25e003d9b4a740cbe4e7cfc3f6d4990e6e178e2c9ec1ef84351e3b9d0c5cb5be","dweb:/ipfs/QmZNbsxwcH4xLVRaQzZ7WS8jHJ1tU2PQL9wzaFZTdrrpEH"]}},"version":1}

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

accrueReward(address).details: Only callable by the authorized gauge during Uniswap V4 hook events.      The returned amount represents the portion of global rewards attributed to      stakers in this specific token bucket based on their staked amounts.

params.token: The non-DCA token bucket to calculate rewards for.

returns.rewardAmount: The amount of rewards attributed to this token bucket.

constructor.details: Sets up the contract with the SuperDCA token address and initial mint rate.      The lastMinted timestamp is set to current block time to start reward accrual.

params._mintRate: The initial mint rate in tokens per second for reward calculations.
params._owner: The address that will own this contract and can perform admin functions.
params._superDCAToken: The ERC20 SuperDCA token address used for staking operations.

returns._0: The amount of SuperDCA tokens staked by the user in the specified bucket.

getUserStakedTokens(address).details: Uses EnumerableSet for efficient tracking of user's active token buckets.

returns._0: An array of token addresses where the user has non-zero stakes.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

previewPending(address).details: Simulates reward accrual by calculating what the reward would be if      accrueReward() were called at the current block timestamp. This allows      users and interfaces to preview rewards before actual accrual.

params.token: The non-DCA token bucket to preview rewards for.

returns._0: The calculated pending reward amount for the token bucket.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setGauge(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner. The gauge is the only address      permitted to call accrueReward() for reward distribution integration.

params._gauge: The gauge contract address to authorize.

setMintRate(uint256).details: Callable by either the contract owner or the authorized gauge for operational      flexibility. Higher mint rates increase reward accumulation speed for all stakers.

params.newMintRate: The new mint rate in tokens per second.

stake(address,uint256).details: Stakes earn rewards proportional to time staked and total pool activity.

params.amount: The amount of SuperDCA tokens to stake.
params.token: The non-DCA token identifying which bucket to stake into.

tokenRewardInfos(address).details: Provides access to the private tokenRewardInfoOf mapping for external queries.

returns.lastRewardIndex_: The reward index when this bucket was last updated.
returns.stakedAmount: The total amount of SuperDCA tokens staked in this bucket.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

params.amount: The amount of SuperDCA tokens to unstake.
params.token: The non-DCA token identifying which bucket to unstake from.

DCA_TOKEN().notice: The SuperDCA token contract address used for all staking operations.

accrueReward(address).notice: Calculates and returns the reward amount for a specific token bucket since last accrual.

constructor.notice: Initializes the SuperDCAStaking contract with core configuration.

gauge().notice: The authorized gauge contract address that can trigger reward accruals.

getUserStake(address,address).notice: Returns the amount of SuperDCA tokens a user has staked in a specific token bucket.

getUserStakedTokens(address).notice: Returns all token buckets where a user has active stakes.

lastMinted().notice: The timestamp when the global reward index was last updated.

mintRate().notice: The current mint rate used for reward index growth (tokens per second).

previewPending(address).notice: Previews pending rewards for a token bucket without updating state.

rewardIndex().notice: The global reward index scaled by 1e18 for mathematical precision.

setGauge(address).notice: Sets the authorized gauge contract address.

setMintRate(uint256).notice: Updates the mint rate used for global reward index growth.

stake(address,uint256).notice: Stakes SuperDCA tokens into a specific token bucket to earn rewards.

tokenRewardInfos(address).notice: Returns the reward accounting information for a specific token bucket.

totalStakedAmount().notice: The total amount of SuperDCA tokens currently staked across all token buckets.

unstake(address,uint256).notice: Unstakes SuperDCA tokens from a specific token bucket.

userStakes(address,address).notice: Maps user addresses to their staked amounts per token bucket.

documentation.text:
@notice The SuperDCA token contract address used for all staking operations.
 @dev This token is staked by users and used for reward calculations.

@notice The authorized gauge contract address that can trigger reward accruals.
 @dev Only this address can call accrueReward() to maintain reward distribution integrity.

@notice The current mint rate used for reward index growth (tokens per second).
 @dev Higher mint rate means faster reward accumulation for stakers.

@notice The timestamp when the global reward index was last updated.
 @dev Used to calculate elapsed time for reward index growth.

@notice The global reward index scaled by 1e18 for mathematical precision.
 @dev Continuously grows based on time elapsed and mint rate.

@notice The total amount of SuperDCA tokens currently staked across all token buckets.
 @dev Used as denominator in reward index calculations.

@notice Maps token addresses to their reward accounting information.
 @dev Private mapping accessed via public view functions.

@notice Maps user addresses to their staked amounts per token bucket.
 @dev Tracks how much each user has staked in each token's bucket.

@notice Maps user addresses to sets of tokens they have staked in.
 @dev Used for efficient enumeration of user's active stakes.

@notice Emitted when the authorized gauge address is updated.
 @param gauge The new gauge address that can call accrueReward.

@notice Emitted when the global reward index is updated.
 @param newIndex The new global reward index value (scaled by 1e18).

@notice Emitted when the mint rate is updated by owner or gauge.
 @param newRate The new mint rate in tokens per second.
@notice Thrown when a zero amount is provided where a positive amount is required.
@notice Thrown when attempting to unstake more than the available balance.
@notice Thrown when a non-gauge address attempts to call gauge-only functions.
@notice Thrown when a zero address is provided where a valid address is required.
@notice Thrown when an unauthorized address attempts to perform admin actions.
@notice Thrown when attempting to stake in a token that hasn't been listed.

@notice Restricts function access to the authorized gauge contract only.
 @dev Used to ensure only the gauge can trigger reward accruals.

@notice Updates the global reward index based on elapsed time and total staked amount.
 @dev The 1e18 scaling factor provides mathematical precision for fractional rewards.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer) view returns (address[] memory)

documentation.text:
@title SuperDCAStaking
 @notice Manages staking mechanics and reward calculations for SuperDCA token holders.
 @dev This contract implements a sophisticated staking system with time-based reward accrual:
      Core Mechanics:
      - Users stake SuperDCA tokens into specific token "buckets" (non-DCA tokens)
      - Global reward index grows continuously based on time and mint rate
      - Individual rewards calculated as: staked_amount * (current_index - user_last_index)
      - Only listed tokens (verified via gauge) can receive stakes
      Integration Architecture:
      - Isolated from Uniswap V4 hook for clean separation of concerns
      - Gauge contract calls accrueReward() during hook events
      - This contract handles accounting; gauge handles minting and distribution
      - Owner/gauge can update mint rate for dynamic reward adjustment
      Security Features:
      - Token listing verification prevents staking in unlisted tokens
      - Per-user token set tracking for efficient queries
      - Authorized gauge pattern prevents unauthorized reward accrual
      - Mathematical precision with 1e18 scaling for reward calculations
